mobileCarChecker.title: Mobile Car Checker
mobileCarChecker.subtitle: Checklist-App – Second Hand Car Buying Guide
mobileCarChecker.intro: With Mobile Car Checker second hand cars can be checked step by step during the inspection for potential problems and money pits.
mobileCarChecker.descPar1: With this mobile Web application you start by creating a car with general data after your registration. Next, the checklist with 11 categories and about 100 questions is available to you.
mobileCarChecker.descPar2: The individual questions can be answered via corresponding checkboxes and, if applicable, estimated repair costs can be specified. At the end, an overview of the results, including the total repair costs, is available to help you decide for or against a purchase. You'll have a stronger position to negotiate the price as well.

features.feat1: Registration / Login / Logout / Password reset / Account deletion
features.feat2: Create and edit a car with general information
features.feat3: Checklist with 11 categories and about 100 questions plus additional information
features.feat4: Evaluation with overview of the check results and, if applicable, the amount of repair costs

zuckerrede.title: Zuckerrede
zuckerrede.subtitle: Independent Wedding Speaker
zuckerrede.intro1: Behind Zuckerede is Katharina Albrecht, who has set up her young company as a freelance wedding speaker for prospective bridal couples.
zuckerrede.intro2: The aim of the website was to create a representative central contact point for the young company. An appealing and at the same time dynamic design were key factors, which were developed and implemented in close cooperation with Katharina.
zuckerrede.descPar1: During the implementation, the Bootstrap library was used in conjunction with jQuery to display dynamic content and animations.

testimonial.text: Christopher, I thank you for your skills, your ideas and your commitment. I could not have imagined a more professional partner for the development of my website. It has turned out absolutely great and is definitely responsible for the successful start of my business.
testimonial.name: Katharina Albrecht

mfaMalAnders.title: MFA mal anders
mfaMalAnders.subtitle: Job and Career Portal for Medical Assistants
mfaMalAnders.intro1: MFA mal anders is a career portal for medical professionals. The website offers a broad portfolio of information about further education and training as well as a job board as a central element.
mfaMalAnders.intro2: The website should have a fresh, modern design and a simple interface for providing new content. It should also provide a way to efficiently collect and publish job advertisements.
mfaMalAnders.descPar1: For the implementation, the content management system WordPress was used in combination with various plug-ins and the page builder Elementor. Further individual adjustments were made using PHP.

testimonial.text: With the support of Chris I was able to successfully implement and market the platform. Within a short time we managed to generate several thousand hits per month without any paid advertising.
testimonial.name: Kristin Maurach

stadtUndGruen.title: Stadt und Grün
stadtUndGruen.subtitle: Gardening and Landscaping
stadtUndGruen.intro1: Stadt und Grün is a small company that offers services around gardening and landscaping.
stadtUndGruen.intro2: The website should be modern, clear and to the point. A clear presentation of the services offered as well as an easy way to contact the company are the central elements of the site.

testimonial.text: Christopher provided us with exactly the modern, clear website that we wanted. And it doesn't matter what device you use to view the site.
testimonial.name: Marcel Frischmuth

travelbook.title: Travelbook – Social Network
travelbook.subtitle: Social Network for Travellers (Sample Project)
travelbook.intro1: Travelbook is a mock social network for travellers around the world who want to connect and stay in touch.
travelbook.intro2: Users can register, provide information about themselves, connect to other users and exchange information with other users in a public or private chat.

features.feat1: Register / Login / Logout / Password reset / Account deletion
features.feat2: Set up your profile with image and bio
features.feat3: Search for other users and look at their profile
features.feat5: Public (all users) and private chat (friends only)

mountainView.title: MOUNTAINview – Imageboard
mountainView.subtitle: Imageboard for mountain pictures
mountainView.intro1: MOUNTAINview is a mock image board where users can publish and view images of mountains.
mountainView.intro2: Users can upload images with title, description, author and tags as well as scroll through and comment on already uploaded images or search for specific tags.

features.feat1: Upload images with title, description, author, tags
features.feat3: Detailed view of individual images including navigation to previous/next image
features.feat5: Live notification of newly uploaded images

freeOrcas.title: Free Orcas – Petition
freeOrcas.subtitle: Digital Petition to Protect Animals
freeOrcas.intro1: Free Orcas is a mock petition in which users call for the liberation of orcas with their digital signature.
freeOrcas.intro2: Users can register with their data and digitally sign with a mouse or touch on a mobile device. After signing, users can see which other users have also signed (optionally filtered by city).

features.feat2: Create and edit your own user profile (name, password, city, age, website)
features.feat3: Digital signing by mouse or touch including removal of the signature
features.feat4: Access to information on additional signatories restricted to signers only
features.feat5: Filter signatories by city and optional link to their website
